question: Among the given pair of vectors, the resultant of two vectors can never be 3 units. The vectors are
explanation: The resultant R of two vectors A and B lies in the range <katex>$|A-B| \le R \le A+B$</katex>.
For (D) 4 and 8: Range is <katex>$|8-4|$</katex> to <katex>$8+4$</katex>, i.e., [4, 12].
